text: Gur-e Dokhtar () is an ancient tomb located in the province of Bushehr in Iran. This grave has great similarities to Cyrus II's tomb in Pasargad, but is smaller. The tomb dates to the 6th century BC. ==See also== * Tomb of Cyrus == References == Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Buildings and structures in Bushehr Province
title: Gur-e-Dokhtar
